name: Latino Commission Donations
description: Accepts donations of clothing, shoes, housewares, small furniture, and small electronics to support alcohol and drug recovery services
fullDescription: The Latino Commission accepts donations of household items and clothing to support their alcohol and drug recovery programs serving the community.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing and shoes
- Accept housewares
- Accept small furniture
- Accept small electronics
- Supports recovery services
- Items help program participants
howToGetIt:
1. Contact Latino Commission
2. Check accepted items list
3. Bring donations to location
4. Items support recovery programs
5. Help community members in need
6. Get donation receipt
keywords: Latino Commission, San Mateo, donate clothes, donate furniture, recovery program, drug rehabilitation, alcohol recovery, clothing donation, household donation
